definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be cold (Ar. qar=a be cold, so Eth. q=qrara: Syr. qar; Targum Ithpa. Is cool onself (rare); Levy cp. also NH Nithp. [[רִתְקָרֵר]] grow calm [i.e. cool]);—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: make or keep cool: Pf. 3 fs. [[הֵקֵ֫רָה]], fig., Je 6:7 Jerus. keepeth her wickedness cool, fresh; Inf. cstr. metapl. [[הָקִיר]] (Ges:§ 67 v) v:Je 6:7, of [[בּוֹר]] keeping water cool (sim.).
